page.title: 17 SUNDAY AT CHURCH
page.content: {Church}starts at 11 O,clock. I get there at 10.55 p.m. We go in and take a seat. While we wait we listen to the organ. The{vicar}comes in, He wears a black and white gown with a red cloak. He says, "Let us worship {God." }He gives the{sermon. }We then sing a{hymn,}listen to some readings from the{Bible}and sing another hymn. A man stands up and tells us when{Holy {Communion}is and the time of the evening service. There is a collection and another hymn is sung. The minister says, "Children and young people may now leave their {departments." }There are five departments for different age groups. I am in the juniors. We play games, draw things, have quizzes, make things and hear stories about God. Before go we say a prayer. We leave at 12 O'Clock.
